root.query: SELECT A.REF_ID , A.REF_NO , A.KO_APP_TITLE , Z.STATUS , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.CRE_DATE , FN_USER_NAME(A.CRE_USER) CRE_USER_NAME , FN_BIZ_CODE_NAME(Z.STATUS, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) STATUS_NAME , C.PATTEAM_RCPT_DATE , FN_COM_CODE_NAME('EXAM_RESULT', C.EXAM_RESULT, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) EXAM_RESULT_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(D.JOB_MAN) JOB_MAN_NAME FROM TB_APP_INT_REQ A , TB_APP_INT_REQ_PAT B , TB_APP_INT_CONSULT C , TB_APP_MST D , TB_BIZ_COM_MST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = B.REF_ID(+) AND A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID(+) AND A.REF_ID = D.REF_ID(+) AND A.REF_ID = Z.REF_ID(+) AND A.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND Z.STATUS = 'S00015'

SELECT A.REF_ID , A.REF_NO , A.KO_APP_TITLE , Z.STATUS , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.CRE_DATE , FN_USER_NAME(A.CRE_USER) CRE_USER_NAME , FN_BIZ_CODE_NAME(Z.STATUS, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) STATUS_NAME , C.PATTEAM_RCPT_DATE , FN_COM_CODE_NAME('EXAM_RESULT', C.EXAM_RESULT, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) EXAM_RESULT_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(D.JOB_MAN) JOB_MAN_NAME FROM TB_APP_INT_REQ A , TB_APP_INT_REQ_PAT B , TB_APP_INT_CONSULT C , TB_APP_MST D , TB_BIZ_COM_MST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = B.REF_ID(+) AND A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID(+) AND A.REF_ID = D.REF_ID(+) AND A.REF_ID = Z.REF_ID(+) AND A.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND Z.STATUS = 'S00016'

SELECT A.REF_ID , FN_LAB_NAME(A.LAB_CODE) || ' - ' || FN_DEPT_NAME(A.DEPT_CODE) LAB_DEPT_NAME , A.KO_APP_TITLE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.REF_NO , A.PATTEAM_REQ_DATE , FN_USER_NAME(A.CRE_USER) CRE_USER_NAME FROM TB_APP_INT_REQ A , TB_BIZ_COM_MST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = Z.REF_ID AND Z.STATUS IN (SELECT T1.CURR_STATUS FROM TB_BIZ_MGT_PROC T1 WHERE T1.BIZ_ACT = 'A00009') AND A.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_APP_INT_CONSULT T WHERE T.REF_ID = A.REF_ID)

SELECT A.REF_ID , A.REF_NO , A.KO_APP_TITLE , A.CRE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(A.OFFICE_CODE) OFFICE_NAME , A.OFFICE_SEND_DATE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , FN_USER_NAME(B.JOB_MAN) JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_COM_CODE_NAME('RIGHT_DIV', B.RIGHT_DIV, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) RIGHT_DIV_NAME FROM TB_APP_INT_CONSULT A , TB_APP_MST B , TB_BIZ_COM_MST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = B.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = Z.REF_ID AND Z.STATUS = 'S00007'

SELECT A.REF_ID , A.REF_NO , A.KO_APP_TITLE , A.CRE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(A.OFFICE_CODE) OFFICE_NAME , A.OFFICE_SEND_DATE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , FN_USER_NAME(B.JOB_MAN) JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_COM_CODE_NAME('RIGHT_DIV', B.RIGHT_DIV, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) RIGHT_DIV_NAME FROM TB_APP_INT_CONSULT A , TB_APP_MST B , TB_BIZ_COM_MST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = B.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = Z.REF_ID AND Z.STATUS = 'S00018'

SELECT A.REF_ID , A.REF_NO , A.KO_APP_TITLE , A.CRE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(A.OFFICE_CODE) OFFICE_NAME , A.OFFICE_SEND_DATE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , FN_USER_NAME(B.JOB_MAN) JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_COM_CODE_NAME('RIGHT_DIV', B.RIGHT_DIV, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) RIGHT_DIV_NAME FROM TB_APP_INT_CONSULT A , TB_APP_MST B , TB_BIZ_COM_MST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = B.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = Z.REF_ID AND Z.STATUS = 'S00019'

SELECT A.REF_ID , A.REF_NO , A.KO_APP_TITLE , A.CRE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(A.OFFICE_CODE) OFFICE_NAME , A.OFFICE_SEND_DATE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , FN_USER_NAME(B.JOB_MAN) JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_COM_CODE_NAME('RIGHT_DIV', B.RIGHT_DIV, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) RIGHT_DIV_NAME FROM TB_APP_INT_CONSULT A , TB_APP_MST B , (SELECT T1.REF_ID FROM TB_PAPER_LIST T1 , (SELECT REF_ID, MAX(LIST_SEQ) LIST_SEQ FROM TB_PAPER_LIST WHERE (PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE) IN (SELECT PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF_LIST WHERE WF_CODE IN (SELECT WF_CODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF WHERE WF_ID IN ('APP_INT35')) ) GROUP BY REF_ID ) T2 WHERE T1.REF_ID = T2.REF_ID AND T1.LIST_SEQ = T2.LIST_SEQ ) X WHERE A.REF_ID = B.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = X.REF_ID AND B.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND B.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND B.ABD_YN = '0' AND B.REG_NO IS NULL

SELECT C.REF_NO , C.APP_NO , FN_PAPER_NAME(A.PAPER_CODE) PAPER_NAME , A.COMMENTS , C.KO_APP_TITLE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.PAPER_DATE , A.DUE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(C.OFFICE_CODE) AS OFFICE_CODE_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(C.JOB_MAN) AS JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_PAPER_NAME(C.STATUS) STATUS_NAME FROM TB_PAPER_LIST A , TB_APP_MST C , (SELECT REF_ID, MAX(LIST_SEQ) LIST_SEQ FROM TB_PAPER_LIST WHERE (PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE) IN (SELECT PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF_LIST WHERE WF_CODE IN (SELECT WF_CODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF WHERE WF_ID IN ('APP_INT40')) ) GROUP BY REF_ID ) X WHERE A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = X.REF_ID AND A.LIST_SEQ = X.LIST_SEQ AND C.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND C.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND C.ABD_YN = '0' AND C.REG_NO IS NULL

SELECT C.REF_NO , C.APP_NO , FN_PAPER_NAME(A.PAPER_CODE) PAPER_NAME , A.COMMENTS , C.KO_APP_TITLE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.PAPER_DATE , A.DUE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(C.OFFICE_CODE) AS OFFICE_CODE_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(C.JOB_MAN) AS JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_PAPER_NAME(C.STATUS) STATUS_NAME FROM TB_PAPER_LIST A , TB_APP_MST C , (SELECT REF_ID, MAX(LIST_SEQ) LIST_SEQ FROM TB_PAPER_LIST WHERE (PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE) IN (SELECT PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF_LIST WHERE WF_CODE IN (SELECT WF_CODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF WHERE WF_ID IN ('APP_INT50', 'APP_INT60')) ) GROUP BY REF_ID ) X WHERE A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = X.REF_ID AND A.LIST_SEQ = X.LIST_SEQ AND C.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND C.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND C.ABD_YN = '0' AND C.REG_NO IS NULL

SELECT A.REF_ID , A.REF_NO , A.KO_APP_TITLE , A.CRE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(A.OFFICE_CODE) OFFICE_NAME , A.OFFICE_SEND_DATE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , FN_USER_NAME(B.JOB_MAN) JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_COM_CODE_NAME('RIGHT_DIV', B.RIGHT_DIV, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) RIGHT_DIV_NAME FROM TB_APP_INT_CONSULT A , TB_APP_MST B , (SELECT T1.REF_ID , T1.PAPER_CODE , T1.PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_LIST T1 , (SELECT REF_ID, MAX(LIST_SEQ) LIST_SEQ FROM TB_PAPER_LIST WHERE (PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE) IN (SELECT PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF_LIST WHERE WF_CODE IN (SELECT WF_CODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF WHERE WF_ID IN ('APP_INT65')) ) GROUP BY REF_ID ) T2 WHERE T1.REF_ID = T2.REF_ID AND T1.LIST_SEQ = T2.LIST_SEQ ) X WHERE A.REF_ID = B.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = X.REF_ID AND B.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND B.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND B.ABD_YN = '0' AND B.REG_NO IS NULL

SELECT A.REF_ID , A.REF_NO , A.KO_APP_TITLE , A.CRE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(A.OFFICE_CODE) OFFICE_NAME , A.OFFICE_SEND_DATE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , FN_USER_NAME(B.JOB_MAN) JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_COM_CODE_NAME('RIGHT_DIV', B.RIGHT_DIV, {@$LANG_CODE}, {@$DEFAULT_LANG_CODE}) RIGHT_DIV_NAME FROM TB_APP_INT_CONSULT A , TB_APP_MST B WHERE A.REF_ID = B.REF_ID AND B.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND B.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND B.ABD_YN = '0' AND B.APP_NO IS NOT NULL AND B.REG_NO IS NULL

SELECT C.REF_NO , C.APP_NO , FN_PAPER_NAME(A.PAPER_CODE) PAPER_NAME , A.COMMENTS , C.KO_APP_TITLE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.PAPER_DATE , A.DUE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(C.OFFICE_CODE) AS OFFICE_CODE_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(C.JOB_MAN) AS JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_PAPER_NAME(C.STATUS) STATUS_NAME FROM TB_PAPER_LIST A , TB_APP_MST C , (SELECT REF_ID, MAX(LIST_SEQ) LIST_SEQ FROM TB_PAPER_LIST WHERE (PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE) IN (SELECT PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF_LIST WHERE WF_CODE IN (SELECT WF_CODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF WHERE WF_ID IN ('OA_INT10')) ) GROUP BY REF_ID ) X , TB_OA_HIST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = X.REF_ID AND A.LIST_SEQ = X.LIST_SEQ AND C.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND C.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND C.ABD_YN = '0' AND C.REG_NO IS NULL AND Z.REF_ID = A.REF_ID AND Z.END_YN = '0'

SELECT C.REF_NO , C.APP_NO , FN_PAPER_NAME(A.PAPER_CODE) PAPER_NAME , A.COMMENTS , C.KO_APP_TITLE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.PAPER_DATE , A.DUE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(C.OFFICE_CODE) AS OFFICE_CODE_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(C.JOB_MAN) AS JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_PAPER_NAME(C.STATUS) STATUS_NAME FROM TB_PAPER_LIST A , TB_APP_MST C , (SELECT REF_ID, MAX(LIST_SEQ) LIST_SEQ FROM TB_PAPER_LIST WHERE (PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE) IN (SELECT PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF_LIST WHERE WF_CODE IN (SELECT WF_CODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF WHERE WF_ID IN ('OA_INT20', 'OA_INT30')) ) GROUP BY REF_ID ) X , TB_OA_HIST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = X.REF_ID AND A.LIST_SEQ = X.LIST_SEQ AND C.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND C.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND C.ABD_YN = '0' AND C.REG_NO IS NULL AND Z.REF_ID = A.REF_ID AND Z.END_YN = '0'

SELECT C.REF_NO , C.APP_NO , FN_PAPER_NAME(A.PAPER_CODE) PAPER_NAME , A.COMMENTS , C.KO_APP_TITLE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.PAPER_DATE , A.DUE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(C.OFFICE_CODE) AS OFFICE_CODE_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(C.JOB_MAN) AS JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_PAPER_NAME(C.STATUS) STATUS_NAME FROM TB_PAPER_LIST A , TB_APP_MST C , (SELECT REF_ID, MAX(LIST_SEQ) LIST_SEQ FROM TB_PAPER_LIST WHERE (PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE) IN (SELECT PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF_LIST WHERE WF_CODE IN (SELECT WF_CODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF WHERE WF_ID IN ('OA_INT40')) ) GROUP BY REF_ID ) X , TB_OA_HIST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = X.REF_ID AND A.LIST_SEQ = X.LIST_SEQ AND C.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND C.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND C.ABD_YN = '0' AND C.REG_NO IS NULL AND Z.REF_ID = A.REF_ID AND Z.END_YN = '0'

SELECT C.REF_NO , C.APP_NO , FN_PAPER_NAME(A.PAPER_CODE) PAPER_NAME , A.COMMENTS , C.KO_APP_TITLE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.PAPER_DATE , A.DUE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(C.OFFICE_CODE) AS OFFICE_CODE_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(C.JOB_MAN) AS JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_PAPER_NAME(C.STATUS) STATUS_NAME FROM TB_PAPER_LIST A , TB_APP_MST C , (SELECT REF_ID, MAX(LIST_SEQ) LIST_SEQ FROM TB_PAPER_LIST WHERE (PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE) IN (SELECT PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF_LIST WHERE WF_CODE IN (SELECT WF_CODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF WHERE WF_ID IN ('OA_INT50')) ) GROUP BY REF_ID ) X , TB_OA_HIST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = X.REF_ID AND A.LIST_SEQ = X.LIST_SEQ AND C.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND C.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND C.ABD_YN = '0' AND C.REG_NO IS NULL AND Z.REF_ID = A.REF_ID AND Z.END_YN = '0'

SELECT C.REF_NO , C.APP_NO , FN_PAPER_NAME(A.PAPER_CODE) PAPER_NAME , A.COMMENTS , C.KO_APP_TITLE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.PAPER_DATE , A.DUE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(C.OFFICE_CODE) AS OFFICE_CODE_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(C.JOB_MAN) AS JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_PAPER_NAME(C.STATUS) STATUS_NAME FROM TB_PAPER_LIST A , TB_APP_MST C , (SELECT REF_ID, MAX(LIST_SEQ) LIST_SEQ FROM TB_PAPER_LIST WHERE (PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE) IN (SELECT PAPER_CODE, PAPER_SUBCODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF_LIST WHERE WF_CODE IN (SELECT WF_CODE FROM TB_PAPER_MGT_WF WHERE WF_ID IN ('OA_INT60')) ) GROUP BY REF_ID ) X , TB_OA_HIST Z WHERE A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID AND A.REF_ID = X.REF_ID AND A.LIST_SEQ = X.LIST_SEQ AND C.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND C.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND C.ABD_YN = '0' AND C.REG_NO IS NULL AND Z.REF_ID = A.REF_ID AND Z.END_YN = '0'

SELECT C.REF_NO , C.APP_NO , FN_PAPER_NAME(A.PAPER_CODE) PAPER_NAME , A.COMMENTS , C.KO_APP_TITLE , FN_INVENTOR_NAMES(A.REF_ID) INVENTOR_NAMES , A.PAPER_DATE , A.DUE_DATE , FN_OFFICE_NAME(C.OFFICE_CODE) AS OFFICE_CODE_NAME , FN_USER_NAME(C.JOB_MAN) AS JOB_MAN_NAME , FN_PAPER_NAME(C.STATUS) STATUS_NAME FROM TB_PAPER_LIST A , TB_APP_MST C WHERE A.REF_ID = C.REF_ID AND C.INOUT_DIV = 'INT' AND C.RIGHT_DIV IN ('10', '20') AND C.ABD_YN = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_OA_HIST Z WHERE Z.REF_ID = C.REF_ID)
